thread.title: Welcome to the Jungle: The Essential Travel Wardrobe for Summer - WSJ.com

author: Photography Lachlan Bailey
title: Welcome to the Jungle: The Essential Travel Wardrobe for Summer - WSJ.com
text: Welcome to the Jungle: The Essential Travel Wardrobe for Summer Follow model Carolyn Murphy on a journey through the wilds of Guadeloupe. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio Scroll GARDEN VARIETY Take a stand in the simplest of uniforms. Prada jacket, $1,970, and shorts, $780, select Prada boutiques, Elizabeth and James tank, $95, neimanmarcus​.com, Jil Sander sandals (worn throughout), $520, jilsander​.com and model’s own necklace (worn throughout). Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio Isabel Marant top, $490, and Isabel Marant Étoile pants, $360, both at isabelmarant​.com. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio OFF ROAD Go wild in naturals. Tod’s shirt, $10,245, tods​.com. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio ROCK SOLID Keep a versatile top layer at the ready. Bottega Veneta coat, $2,700, 800-845-6790, Solace London swimsuit, price upon request, solacelondon​.com, Jil Sander sandals, $520, jilsander​.com. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio Chloé vest, $4,995, chloe​.com, Elizabeth and James tank, $95, neimanmarcus​.com, Matteau bikini bottom, $135, matteau-swim​.com. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio FOUNTAIN OF YOUTH Wade into the shallows for an instant dose of refreshment. Elizabeth and James tank, $95, neimanmarcus​.com, Matteau bikini bottom, $135, matteau-swim​.com. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio CURRENT AFFAIR Cool off in utility-inspired staples. Michael Kors Collection trench, $2,995, and bag, $790, select Michael Kors stores, Made by Dawn swimsuit, $269, modaoperandi​.com. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio Céline shirt, $1,050, Céline, 870 Madison Avenue, New York, and pants, price upon request, similar styles available at Céline, 870 Madison Avenue, New York. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio Louis Vuitton shirt, price upon request, select Louis Vuitton stores, Isabel Marant Étoile pants, $360, isabelmarant​.com, Jil Sander sandals, $520, jilsander​.com. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio STATE OF GRACE Loose blouses and capes are wardrobe chameleons. Saint Laurent by Anthony Vaccarello cape, $1,990, bra, $1,380, and briefs, $590, Saint Laurent, 3 East 57th Street, New York, Jil Sander sandals (worn throughout), $520, jilsander​.com. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio TRUNK SHOW Earth tones harmonize with anything. Gucci jacket, $14,500, select Gucci stores nationwide, Prism bikini bottom, $125, prismlondon​.com. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio Céline coat, price upon request, similar styles available at Céline, 870 Madison Avenue, New York, Alberta Ferretti swimsuit, $395, barneys​.com, Jil Sander sandals, $520, jilsander​.com. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio Alberta Ferretti sweater, $795, barneys​.com, Zimmermann bikini, $210 (sold as a set), us.zimmermann​.com, Gianvito Rossi boots, $1,495, gianvitorossi​.com. Model, Carolyn Murphy at IMG Models; hair, Rudi Lewis; makeup, Petros Petrohilos. Photography by Lachlan Bailey; Styling by Geraldine Saglio Advertisement
